definition: regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: There are beautiful prose poetry offered in our Prose and Poetry section.
sentences.chinese: 在“散文诗”这个栏目里有许多美妙的散文诗提供。

sentences.english: The website will also have a section to encourage people to submit their own writings.
sentences.chinese: 网站中包含一个自助栏目，鼓励用户提交自己的作品。

sentences.english: Write the plurals of these words in the correct columns below.
sentences.chinese: 粗中名词的复数形式填入正确的栏目中。

sentences.english: Make plurals of these words and write them in the correct columns below.
sentences.chinese: 将以下名词的复数形式填入正确的栏目内。

sentences.english: The homepages of many web sites have the column related to chat.
sentences.chinese: 很多网站的主页上都有与聊天有关的栏目。

sentences.english: Future columns will present these topics in detail.
sentences.chinese: 这些主题将在以后的栏目中详细介绍。

sentences.english: I'd like to write a scroll for the program, Happy China.
sentences.chinese: 那我今天就为《快乐中国》栏目写一卷书法。

sentences.english: Some readers might notice an air of listlessness emanating from LiS HQ this week.
sentences.chinese: 有些读者或许已经注意到了本星期栏目的平淡乏味。

sentences.english: The article holds that the anchorman of a cultural TV program should be an image of a scholar.
sentences.chinese: 文化栏目主持人应该是学者型的主持人。

sentences.english: No time limitation character is the foremost in the packaging of TV subject logo design.
sentences.chinese: 不具有时效性是电视栏目包装中标志设计最重要之点。

sentences.english: Here the New York Times curates its readers' debate.
sentences.chinese: 该栏目中纽约时报为读者的争论充当牧师角色。

sentences.english: Chapter four analyses the modernized communication means and marketing tactics of the TV opera program.
sentences.chinese: 第三章对四档著名电视戏曲栏目展开个案分析。

sentences.english: Choose to include all columns in the list.
sentences.chinese: 选择包含清单中的所有栏目。

sentences.english: They angled their column towards modern young women.
sentences.chinese: 他们使其栏目侧重于现代年轻女性。

sentences.english: In particular, the television programs are the basic unit for TV channels' layout.
sentences.chinese: 从微观上说，电视栏目是电视频道编排的基本单元。

sentences.english: Now it’s just a résumé item.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，这只是履历表中的一个栏目。

definition: China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to exhibit as broadcast/to show (on TV)
printing block/section (of a newspaper)/board (of BBS or discussion forum)
